title: IELTS Writing Task 1
content:
Writing Task 1

核心：用你的语言呈现图中的信息

(尽量避免总结，个人观点和思考)

数据类模板

第一段，介绍图表：

The given xxx chart/graph illustrates/demonstrates the details concerning xxx (time…)

第二段，明显内容：

In general/Generally, it could be obviously witnessed that xxx.

What is more, xxx

Moreover, it is noteworthy that …

第三段，细节数据：

Upon closer examination of the data, it is discernible that …

第四段，细节数据：

Furthermore, xxx.

Moreover, it is palpable and noteworthy that xxx.

词汇

上升：
  • surge 急速上升
  • modest rise 适度的上升
  • increase 增加
  • climb 攀升
  • grow 增长
  • escalate 上升
  • spike 猛增
  • soar 飙升
  • jump 跳跃式上升
下降：

  • decline 下降
  • decrease 减少
  • drop 下跌
  • fall 下降
  • plummet 暴跌
  • reduce 减少
  • sink 下沉
  • slide 滑落
  • dip 轻微下降

稳定：
  • relatively stable 相对稳定的
  • steady 稳定的
  • exhibit minimal fluctuations 波动很少
  • remain constant 保持不变
  • unchanged 不变的
  • maintain 保持
  • flat 稳定的
  • level off 趋于平缓
  • plateau 达到稳定期
波动：

  • show considerable volatility 展现了相当大的波动性
  • fluctuate 波动
  • oscillate 震荡
  • swing 摇摆
  • vary 变化
  • undulate 波动
  • ebb and flow 起伏
  • instability 不稳定
  • erratic 变化无常的

第二段具体句式(总体)

持续地上升，下降：
  • The number/percentage/xxx of A exhibits a persistent upward/downward trajectory from 2000 to 2005.
  • The data reveals a consistent rise in xxx.
  • The xxx exhibited a consistent growth pattern during the period between 2000 and 2005
  • The graph depicts a continuous upward trend in xxx.
急剧下降:

  • The figure plummeted dramatically in xxx.

稳定:

  • The figures plateaued at xxx.

  • There has been little to no fluctuation in xxx.

正负相关:

  • The number/percentage/xxx is positively/negatively related to xxx.

  • The two sets of figures move in tandem/opposite directions.

中途超过:

  • The number/percentage/xxx of A surpassed that of B from 2000 to 2005.

  • A outpaces B in terms of xxx.

  • A surpass B but a noticeable margin.

第三段具体句式（细节）

数据是多少

  • There was a reported figure of 100 for xxx in 2000.

数据比谁高多少
  • The number of A was higher than that of B by 100.
  • The data indicates that A significantly outstripped B, with A’s figure reaching xxx compared to B’s xxx.
倍数关系

  • The quantity of A was threefold that of B, which an accounting for xxx, a tripling compared to B’s xxx.
  • The changes of A generally mirrored those of B, except …

数据变到了多少
  • The number of A experienced a remarkable surge, elevating sharply from 100 to 200.
  • There is a significant surge in the number of A, escalating from xxx in 2000 to xxx in 2005.
  • xxx began with a significant increase of 6% in January, followed by a sharp decline to -3% in June. (转折)
数据波动

  • The data for A demonstrated considerable fluctuations, oscillating between xxx and xxx throughout the 10 years.

数据稳定

  • The figures for A remained stable, consistently hovering around from xxx to xxx.

  • The xxx remained relatively constant, with an average of roughly …

连接词

顺承: subsequently, additionally

对比: in contrast, conversely

强调: indeed, notably

举例: for instance

原因 : owing to, in view of

结果: consequently

范文

Line Graph

The line graph shows the sales of children’s books, adult’s fictions and educational books between 2002 and 2006 in one country.

The given line graph depicts the figures for three kinds of books in a certain nation between the years 2002 and 2006.

In general, it is observable that the sales of children’s book exhibited a consistent growth pattern during the aforementioned period. Moreover, it is noteworthy that the sales of educational books remained lower than those of others from 2002 to 2005.

Upon closer examination of the data, it is discernible that the sales of children’s book began at approximately 32 million dollars, escalated to around 46 million dollars in 2005, and culminated at its highest point in 2006. Conversely, the sales of educational books remained relatively constant, with an average of roughly 28 million dollars.

Furthermore, the sales of adults’ fiction commenced at about 45 million dollars in 2002 and underwent a reduction of about 9 million dollars in 2003. Then, a marginal increase was observed followed by a drop of approximately 10 million dollars in the subsequent years.

The graph below shows the average monthly change in the prices of three metals during 2014. Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features,and make comparisons where relevant.

The given line graph illustrates the average monthly percentage change in the prices of copper, nickel, and zinc during 2014.

In general, it is evident that the average monthly percentage changes in the prices of nickel and zinc fluctuated throughout the year, while copper prices remained relatively stable. Specifically, the percentage change in zinc prices rose towards the end of the year, whereas nickel prices experienced a decline. Moreover, the stability in the percentage changes of copper prices is noteworthy compared to the other two metals.

Upon closer examination of the data, it is clear that the price of nickel began with a significant increase of 6% in January, followed by a sharp decline to -3% in June. After maintaining a steady trajectory for three months, there was a rapid increase to 1% in November. Furthermore, the changes in zinc prices generally mirrored those of nickel, except in January when zinc showed a modest rise of 1%. Additionally, the price of copper exhibited minimal fluctuations, hovering between -0.5% and 2% throughout the year.

In conclusion, while nickel and zinc prices showed considerable volatility in 2014, copper prices remained relatively stable, highlighting the distinct price behaviors of these metals.

The graph below gives information about the percentage of the population in four Asian countries living in cities from 1970 to 2020, with predictions for 2030 and 2040. Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.
Write at least 150 words.

The line graph illustrates the percentage of the population living in cities in four Asian countries from 1970 to 2020, with predictions for 2030 and 2040.

In general, it is evident that the urban populations in all four countries followed persistent upward trajectories from 1970 to 2020, and are predicted to continue growing steadily. Moreover, the trends for the Philippines and Thailand follow a comparable pattern, while Indonesia and Malaysia exhibit similar increasing patterns.

Upon closer examination, the urban populations of both Malaysia and the Philippines began at approximately 31 percent in 1970. However, while Malaysia’s urban population is predicted to surge to 81 percent by 2040, the Philippines is expected to see a more modest rise, reaching 53 percent.

Furthermore, Thailand’s urban population rate started at 18 percent, and Indonesia’s at 14 percent in 1970. However, by 2020, Indonesia had surpassed Thailand, and it is projected to continue growing rapidly to 60 percent by 2040, while Thailand’s is predicted to reach 48 percent.

Bar Chart

The chart below shows the number of households in the US by their annual income in 2007, 2011 and 2015. Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.

The bar chart provides information about the number of US households categorized by different annual income brackets in the years 2007, 2011, and 2015.

In general, it can be observed that lower-income groups had a higher number of households compared to wealthier groups, with the exception of the highest income bracket. Additionally, the second-highest income group consistently had the fewest households throughout the period.

Looking more closely at the data, the number of households in the lowest income group (less than $25,000) and the second-lowest income group ($25,000-$49,999) were quite similar, with both standing at around 26 million in 2007. By 2015, both groups saw a modest increase, reaching approximately 28 million. Meanwhile, households with an annual income between $50,000 and $74,999 remained relatively stable, hovering around 22 million over the same period.

Furthermore, the second-highest income group ($75,000-$99,999) experienced little fluctuation, remaining steady at approximately 14 million households between 2007 and 2015. Households earning $100,000 or more represented the largest group in 2015, increasing from 29 million in 2007 to 33 million by 2015.

流程图

第一段，介绍流程

The diagram demonstrates the sequence of events in the xxx process.

The flowchart exhibits the various steps required to complete the xxx process.

The diagram demonstrates the intricate details of xxx, providing a comprehensive overview of its integral components.

第二段，宏观信息

Generally, it could be witnessed that totally 18 steps in relation to the whole process.

What is more, xxx

The process can be meticulously broken down into a total xxx distinct phrases, each of which plays a pivotal role in the overall sequence.

第三第四段，具体流程

Upon closer examination towards the process, xxx.

Moreover, xxx.

直线类

流程从A开始，到B结束

  • Starting from A, the process moves through several steps and ends at B.

  • Commencing with the initiation of A, the progression then methodically transitions through a series of intricately interwoven stages, culminating in the finalization at B.

在进入下一个步骤之前，xxx发生了

  • Before advancing to the next phase, xxx occurs.

A结束后，步骤就到了B

  • Once A is finished, the process moves on to B

分支类

  • In the mean time, xxx is happening alongside xxx.

  • Once reaching the juncture at xxx, the process splits into two divergent pathways: one leading towards xxx and the other navigating towards xxx.

循环类

A cyclic pattern is evident, with xxx recurrently looping back to xxx, thereby perpetuating a continuous cycle of operations.

位置图

第一段

The map highlights the notable changes took place in xxx from 2002 to 2003.

The maps illustrates the changes that have taken places in xxx over the years, specially between xxx and xxx.

The provided map portrays the evolving landscape of xxx(地区) over the whole period.

第三第四段

In the central region of A, a new xxx has been constructed.

xxx被修建在A区域的中间

During the period, the A area has experienced substantial growth and improvement, including the new-building xxx.

A区域扩张了，包括一个新建的xxx

某物在某位置
  • Nestled in the xxx quadrant of the depicted scheme, a prominent xxx emerges.
  • In the xxx part of the diagram, you can see a noticeable xxx.
  • Commanding a central position within the illustration, the xxx is conspicuously situated.
  • Perched at the edge of the delineated region, the xxx marks its presence.
旁边有什么

Abutting the A, B asserts itself.

面积增大

A palpable enlargement in the domain of the xxx is observed, suggesting spatial expansion.

There is a noticeable increase in the size of the xxx, indicating it has expanded

某设施更换

Where the xxx once stood in xxx, now the xxx makes its mark

某设施数量增加

xxx now boasts an increased array of xxx

Articles

The maps below show an industrial area in the town of Norbiton, and planned future development of the site.

Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.

The maps illustrate the current layout of the Norbiton industrial area and the proposed future development of the region.

In general, it is evident that more residential areas and facilities will replace the current factories. Additionally, a bridge will be constructed over the river, linking the northern farmland to the central area.

Upon closer examination, the main circular road will remain intact, while an additional smaller roundabout will be added to the southern part of the primary road, with a medical center located to its northeast. A road branching off to the right will lead to a school, and another road will extend northwards from the center. A playground will be established in this area, with houses surrounding the street.

Additionally, a new road will extend to the northwest from the central roundabout, with three housing units planned for the north of this road. A shopping area will also be constructed to the west.
